cu.explanation_en: Local SCTP address changed to 10.0.0.1, which is not in the loopback range and may be unreachable, causing F1 interface connection failures.

du.explanation_en: Setting Num_Threads_PHY to 0, which is out of the valid range (typically 1 or more), causing potential thread allocation failures in PHY processing.
du.explanation_zh: 将 Num_Threads_PHY 设置为 0，这超出了有效范围（通常为 1 或更多），导致 PHY 处理中的线程分配失败。
